revision.text:
<languages/>
The '''Shop''' is a [[Bot Commands|bot command]] used in the discord to unlock various things.  It is accessed by typing in /shop in the #bot-commands channel, and costs [[Coins (Discord)| coins]] {{Pdollar}} to purchase.  If purchasing a pokémon, this will unlock a code which can be used in the [[Save Menu|save menu]] to add the pokémon to your game.  You must link your discord account to your game to use the codes.  Once unlocked, you can use the code on any of your save files (AKA, you can use it for your main save, and you challenge save).  For more information about the unlocked pokémon stats, see [[Obtainable Pokémon#Events & Discord Exclusives|Obtainable Pokémon]].  For more information about discord roles, see [[Discord Roles]]
